name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta in boiling water.
Brown the ground beef in a pan.
Add onions, garlic, and tomatoes.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta.

name: Chicken Tacos
description: Delicious lovely Mexican tacos filled with seasoned chicken.
instructions: Season the chicken with spices
Cook the chicken on a grill or stovetop
Warm the tortillas
Assemble the tacos with chicken, salsa, lettuce, and other desired toppings
Serve and enjoy!

name: Avocado Toast
description: A simple and nutritious breakfast or snack option.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle salt, pepper, and red chili flakes.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Optional: Add toppings like sliced tomatoes or feta cheese.
Serve and enjoy!

name: Cheesy Chicken Burger
description: A delicious chicken burger made with a grilled chicken patty and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Season the chicken patty with salt, pepper and preferred spices.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken patty until cooked through.
Toast the burger bun on a grill or in a toaster.
Spread your mayonese sauce on the bottom bun.
Place the cooked chicken patty on top of the sauce.
Layer lettuce, tomato slices, and onion rings on top of the chicken patty.
Add additional toppings.
Cover with the top bun.
Serve the chicken burger with fries or a side salad.
